definitions.title: I. subst.
definitions.body: height (poet.) † Ho 7:16 [[יׇשׁוּבוּ לאׁ עָׂל]] they return (but) not upwards (i.e. not God-wards), Ho 11:7 [[וְאֶל־עַל]] [[יִקְרָאֻהוּ]] they (the prophets) call it (the people) upwards, (but) none striveth to rise; as adv. accus., 2Sa 23:1 the man [[åֻהקַּם êָעל]] (that) is raised up on high. With [[מִן]], [[מֵעָָל]], † [[שׁמים מֵעָָל]]([[ה]]) (the) heavens above Ge 27:39, Ge 49:25, Ps 50:4 (opp. [[מִתַּחַת]] Ex 20:4. In prose [[מִמַּעַל]]).
